io.grant.utils

类 RetryerBuilder<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.grant.utils.RetryerBuilder<V>

  • public class RetryerBuilder<V>
extends Object
    失败重试工具类

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Retryer<V> build()
      Builds the retryer.
      AsyncRetryer<V> buildAsyncRetryer() 
      static <V> RetryerBuilder<V> newBuilder()
      Constructs a new builder
      RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfException()
      Configures the retryer to retry if an exception (i.e. any Exception or subclass of Exception) is thrown by the call.
      RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfException(java.util.function.Predicate<Throwable> exceptionPredicate)
      Configures the retryer to retry if an exception satisfying the given predicate is thrown by the call.
      RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfExceptionOfType(Class<? extends Throwable> exceptionClass)
      Configures the retryer to retry if an exception of the given class (or subclass of the given class) is thrown by the call.
      RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfResult(java.util.function.Predicate<V> resultPredicate)
      Configures the retryer to retry if the result satisfies the given predicate.
      RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfRuntimeException()
      Configures the retryer to retry if a runtime exception (i.e. any RuntimeException or subclass of RuntimeException) is thrown by the call.
      RetryerBuilder<V> withAttemptTimeLimiter(AttemptTimeLimiter<V> attemptTimeLimiter)
      Configures the retryer to limit the duration of any particular attempt by the given duration.
      RetryerBuilder<V> withBlockStrategy(BlockStrategy blockStrategy)
      Sets the block strategy used to decide how to block between retry attempts.
      RetryerBuilder<V> withExecutor(ScheduledExecutorService executor) 
      RetryerBuilder<V> withRetryListener(RetryListener<V> listener)
      Adds a listener that will be notified of each attempt that is made
      RetryerBuilder<V> withStopStrategy(StopStrategy stopStrategy)
      Sets the stop strategy used to decide when to stop retrying.
      RetryerBuilder<V> withWaitStrategy(WaitStrategy waitStrategy)
      Sets the wait strategy used to decide how long to sleep between failed attempts.

    • 方法详细资料

      • newBuilder

        public static <V> RetryerBuilder<V> newBuilder()
        Constructs a new builder
        类型参数:
        V - result of a Retryer's call, the type of the call return value
        返回:
        the new builder

      • withRetryListener

        public RetryerBuilder<V> withRetryListener(RetryListener<V> listener)
        Adds a listener that will be notified of each attempt that is made
        参数:
        listener - Listener to add
        返回:
        this

      • withWaitStrategy

        public RetryerBuilder<V> withWaitStrategy(WaitStrategy waitStrategy)
                                   throws IllegalStateException
        Sets the wait strategy used to decide how long to sleep between failed attempts. The default strategy is to retry immediately after a failed attempt.
        参数:
        waitStrategy - the strategy used to sleep between failed attempts
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if a wait strategy has already been set.

      • withStopStrategy

        public RetryerBuilder<V> withStopStrategy(StopStrategy stopStrategy)
                                   throws IllegalStateException
        Sets the stop strategy used to decide when to stop retrying. The default strategy is to not stop at all .
        参数:
        stopStrategy - the strategy used to decide when to stop retrying
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if a stop strategy has already been set.

      • withBlockStrategy

        public RetryerBuilder<V> withBlockStrategy(BlockStrategy blockStrategy)
                                    throws IllegalStateException
        Sets the block strategy used to decide how to block between retry attempts. The default strategy is to use Thread#sleep().
        参数:
        blockStrategy - the strategy used to decide how to block between retry attempts
        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if a block strategy has already been set.

      • withAttemptTimeLimiter

        public RetryerBuilder<V> withAttemptTimeLimiter(AttemptTimeLimiter<V> attemptTimeLimiter)
        Configures the retryer to limit the duration of any particular attempt by the given duration.
        参数:
        attemptTimeLimiter - to apply to each attempt
        返回:
        this

      • withExecutor

        public RetryerBuilder<V> withExecutor(ScheduledExecutorService executor)

      • retryIfException

        public RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfException()
        Configures the retryer to retry if an exception (i.e. any Exception or subclass of Exception) is thrown by the call.
        返回:
        this

      • retryIfRuntimeException

        public RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfRuntimeException()
        Configures the retryer to retry if a runtime exception (i.e. any RuntimeException or subclass of RuntimeException) is thrown by the call.
        返回:
        this

      • retryIfExceptionOfType

        public RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfExceptionOfType(Class<? extends Throwable> exceptionClass)
        Configures the retryer to retry if an exception of the given class (or subclass of the given class) is thrown by the call.
        参数:
        exceptionClass - the type of the exception which should cause the retryer to retry
        返回:
        this

      • retryIfException

        public RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfException(java.util.function.Predicate<Throwable> exceptionPredicate)
        Configures the retryer to retry if an exception satisfying the given predicate is thrown by the call.
        参数:
        exceptionPredicate - the predicate which causes a retry if satisfied
        返回:
        this

      • retryIfResult

        public RetryerBuilder<V> retryIfResult(java.util.function.Predicate<V> resultPredicate)
        Configures the retryer to retry if the result satisfies the given predicate.
        参数:
        resultPredicate - a predicate applied to the result, and which causes the retryer to retry if the predicate is satisfied
        返回:
        this

      • build

        public Retryer<V> build()
        Builds the retryer.
        返回:
        the built retryer.

      • buildAsyncRetryer

        public AsyncRetryer<V> buildAsyncRetryer()
        返回:
        the built AsyncRetryer
